QuestData.Title: The Waters of Youth
QuestData.Description: She is headstrong, my little Lyalia. I should have known she would try to challenge the Lord Reclaimer.$b$bSince her mother died, I forsook much of the time I should have spent with her in search of immortality, insisting that we could live forever, together.$b$bAnd now my obsession has cost my little Lyalia her life.$b$bPlease, $p, when she wakes, tell her I love her.
QuestData.RewardText: He... he shouldn't have done that! He shouldn't have paid for my mistake!
